Package org.jd3

Interface Summary
D3File The interface of the Java representation for a D3 File which define basic operation that could be done with a file
D3SelectList The interface of a D3 select list
D3Session Interface of the session definition, use for basic operation on the server
 

Class Summary
D3Buffer The message receive by the D3Connection when it speek with the D3 server
D3Connection The main class of jd3 who communicate with the D3 server
D3Constants The constants used by jd3
D3Date  
D3FileTcp The implementation of a D3File who use a TCP/IP socket to communicate with the D3 server
D3Item This is the Java representation of a D3 record with the Vector class, it can simulate a dynamic structure of data
D3Params Class to manage the parameters of a D3 Subroutine
D3SelectListFile The implmentation of a select list for on a file Ex: in pickbasic open "file" to ff select ff
D3SelectListTcl The implmentation of a select list create by an TCL command Ex : at TCL :SELECT myfile WITH A1 = "a]" 3 items selected >
D3SessionTcp Implementation of the D3Session who uses a TCP/IP socket
